bug.author: puneethmishra
bug.summary: fastai v2 doest not have DatasetType
bug.description: This command does not work in FastAI version 2. from fastai.vision import DatasetType, open_image please do let us know the alternative

comments.comment: We currently do not support fastai v2 since it is still being developed. Instead, we assume version 1.0.57 (see the environment.yml) file, but our code should also work with the latest official fast.ai <denchmark-link:https://github.com/fastai/fastai/releases>release</denchmark-link> (1.0.60)
Thanks. Is the role of DatasetType more to split the data into training and testing What so the role of DatasetType.fix?

DatasetType is defined by fast.ai and only used in this repo. See e.g. here: <denchmark-link:https://docs.fast.ai/basic_data.html#DatasetType>https://docs.fast.ai/basic_data.html#DatasetType</denchmark-link>
